title: Should i choose quickbooks or sage for managing the company accounts?
body:
QuickBooks vs Sage. QuickBooks and Sage One are two popular business management services. Both offer slightly different services. QuickBooks focuses more on bookkeeping and accounting services while Sage One is a feature-rich project management service.

so which one should i choose?

http://sage.mysupportphonenumber.example.com/
why:

Body - Position 334-348: phonenumber.co
